title: Design a New Wing Structure
description: An engineer needs to design a new composite wing structure for a next-generation aircraft, focusing on weight reduction and strength.

tasks.description: Define the aerodynamic load cases and performance requirements for the wing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent defines a complete set of load and performance parameters.

tasks.description: Create a detailed 3D CAD model of the wing structure, including spars, ribs, and skin.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a complete and valid CAD model.

tasks.description: Run a Finite Element Analysis (FEA) to simulate stress and deformation under the defined load cases.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs the simulation and confirms that stress levels are within safety margins.
